name: HodgePodge (jakesamuellawrence)
description:
Build HodgePodge component by component as you battle your way through a dungeon

Note: in-game controls indicate you can use a controller, but controller does not actually work

To run:
Download the zip, unzip it, and run the exe.

Instructions:
 - Do not let anything damage your core.
 - Escape to quit
 - To restart, quit the game and launch it again (ran out of time to add a restart button, whoops!)
 - WASD to move
 - Arrow keys to rotate
 - Space bar to shoot
